messages.date_in_past: It looks like that raid already happened, so I'm not going to process it. Please contact an admin if that's incorrect.
messages.could_not_parse: Could not determine all the necessary information from the image. Please make sure you're posting an uncropped screenshot of your invitation with no overlays.
messages.match_not_centered: That image doesn't look like what I expect. Please make sure you're posting an uncropped screenshot of your invitation with no overlays.
messages.too_few_lines: I didn't find all the text I was expecting in that image. Please check that your image includes the full city/state/country location of the raid.
messages.invalid_city: The location information that image isn't what I was expecting. Are you sure the raid is local to this area?
messages.user_already_in_channel: It looks like you're already in that channel.
messages.channel_add_error: Something went wrong adding you to the channel. Sorry about that.
messages.channel_create_error: Something went wrong creating the channel. Sorry about that.
messages.not_allowed_to_reprocess: Sorry, you're not allowed to ask me to reprocess this message
